articles.title: Nintendo lowers price of base Switch model in Europe - Eurogamer.net
articles.content:
Nintendo's basic Switch model is now cheaper in the UK and mainland Europe by around £20.
That makes it £259.99/€299.99, down from £279.99/€329.99. For comparison, the upcoming Switch OLED is set to… [+847 chars]
